content: do you like it when lines meld and change creating new patterns i do this little cowl uses different sequences of knits and purls to create lines that move and change and then change back across the cowl leaving one or two buttons unbuttoned allows the cowl to drape over your collar just a bit this is an easy and quick knit errata page 2 section 2 row 2 should read r2 ws k3 sm p1 k1 to last 4 sts p1 sm k3 corrected in pattern as of 26 jan 2020
